post.body: I just followed @criseyde solely because she DID do an interview with her. Everyone's gotta have a hero, I guess.
#sigh I hope so. It would be a dream come true, and that hasn't happened to me in a long, long time. ::wishes on a star::
not really. most of the stoners I know are metalheads. found you by searching for sublime, btw. :D
October? Looks like you're not on here much anymore. Well, hello from me to you.
... when I think Power Pop, I think of The Cars, Avril Lavigne, and Blink182 ... I assume that's not what you're thinking?
Power Pop, eh? I just made an anti-pop. Sneaker Pimps, Gorrilaz, Chiasm, Depeche Mode .. god only knows where it's gonna go.
You don't use twitter much, eh?
what is this hashtags thing? #snowpocalypse sounds funny. Is there a #abracapocalypse ?
Web Exclusive! Interview with Brody Dalle: http://altpress.com/features/284.htm
Seems like Spinnerette ( <3 Brody ) has been signed to Rushes label. >.< Why did I miss their small gigs before they got signed?
Why? All the kings horses and all the kings men and all that is now and all that is gone and all thats to come and everything under the sun.
Change and revolution are not produced by opposition.
When one cannot exist without the other, existence is perverted and perpetual.
Well, so far twitter seems pretty basic. It would seem that all I have to do now is meet more computer nerds. Not my usual, but nice.
I'm figuring out how to use twitter. Guess I'm twitterpated? ... o_O
